channel.title: Crusader
channel.description:
So I decided to take the oh so original Stronghold render and do something with it, my first real attempt at a tag (Not counting the 3 sigs I made following tutorials). Also please leave the Hyjall tag out of the C&C because that was just because I had to show a friend of mine.
[IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/5910/crusaderxy4.png[/img]

item.title: Crusader
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

The blood should be a more vivid, rich blood red. Other than that its cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Crusader
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

well it would look better without the box, a BIT too much “blood” on the focal, did you use grunge on the background?
also, the top right looks a bit too plain, could of made it like the bottom left?
6/10

Read full topic

item.title: Crusader
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Thats actually pretty nice. If you where to take the box around Crusader away, it would look better(its destroying balance). Also, you should have the lines a little less sharp(shield), like, blur them.

7/10.

Read full topic

item.title: Crusader
item.dc:creator: @Larenzo Larenzo
item.description:
@Larenzo wrote:

Love it, 8/10
The Middle box that contains crusader can go up a little because its like overlapping a bit.

Read full topic
